sentence.Network_en: The extremozymes are able to take biocatalytic effect under various extreme conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 极端酶能在各种极端环境中起生物催化作用.

sentence.Network_en: Extremozymes have unique biocatalytic function comparable to those prevailing enzymes in food processes.
sentence.Network_cn: 与目前食品工业生产中应用的酶相比,极端酶有其独特的生物催化功能.

sentence.Network_en: The problems existing in industrial application of biocatalytic preparation of chiral compounds are also discussed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对生物催化制备手性化合物工业应用中存在的一些问题进行了讨论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: biocatalytic properties of enzymes in nearly anhydrous organic solvents ., 酶在接近无水有机介质中的生物催化特性.

list.abs: in this paper , the types and characteristics of biocatalytic membrane reactors and their applications in food industry , pharmaceutical industry and wastewater treatment fields were reviewed .本文对生物催化膜反应器的类型、特点及在食品、医药及废水处理方面的应用作以综述。
